data.text: The leaders of Israel are constantly wavering about seeking help from other countries.
Yahweh says that he will bring accusations against the leaders of Judah,
When Jacob was in his mother’s womb, he grabbed his brother Esau’s heel because he wanted to be born first.
He struggled with the one who had appeared to him in the form of an angel, and Jacob defeated him,
That was the Commander of the armies of angels
But you people of Israel must return to your God!
The merchants among you use scales that do not weigh correctly;
The people of Israel boast, saying
Many times I spoke to the prophets,
The people of Gilead city are [RHQ] extremely wicked;
Your ancestor Jacob fled from his brother Esau
Many years later, Yahweh enabled a prophet to bring the ancestors of you people of Israel here from Egypt;
But now the people of Israel have caused Yahweh to become very angry;
